aeon-line.aeon-raw: The surroundings are dry and without moisture, a fact evident even in the dim morning light. There are 5 Ashtani corsairs here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Perched upon the edge of the battlement, a statue of Tanris Rozzan stares sightlessly across the land. A crystalline golem stands here. Placed in preparatory memoriam, implacable chiselwork marks this gravestone "SERAGORN". Mounted atop the battlement, a mighty wooden ballista points out over the gates. Placed in preparatory memoriam, implacable chiselwork marks this gravestone "AUSTERE". A gilded pike with the decapitated heads of Mercurus, Talamond, Issam, Atalkez, Lii, Mako, Ainly, Wicella, Chissa, Mycen and Herutar has been erected here. Turgid and blistered, a severed leg lies motionless here. A skullcap flower lies here. A brittle-looking crimson shard lies here, surrounded with a pulsating sable glow. The transparent form of a tundra mammoth towers above you, its spectral self strangely silent.

The transparent form of a tundra mammoth towers above you, its spectral self strangely silent.
